title: Clean Marina Beach Drive
description: Join our effort to clean up one of the most polluted beaches in Chennai. We're organizing a massive cleanup drive with over 500 volunteers expected to participate.
creator: Suresh V

title: Books for All
description: Help us collect books for underprivileged students in Sonipat. Every book donated can change a child's future.
creator: Raghav Arora

title: Stray Dog Vaccination Camp
description: Support our NGO in vaccinating over 100 street dogs in Bangalore. Help us create a safer community for both animals and humans.
creator: PawsCare

title: Digital Literacy for Seniors
description: Teaching basic smartphone and internet skills to senior citizens in rural areas.
creator: TechForAll

title: Urban Farming Initiative
description: Setting up rooftop gardens in urban apartments to promote sustainable living.
creator: GreenSpaces Mumbai
